import * as request from "../../utils/request"; import images from "../../assets/images"; import "./payment.css"; import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.css'; import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; function Payment(){ const [infoProductOrders, setInfoProductOrder] = useState([]); const handleGetInfoProductOrder = () => { console.log(parseInt(localStorage.getItem('auth_matk'))) const conditionToGetProductOrder = { matk: localStorage.getItem('auth_matk'), selected: 1, } request.get("/api/infoProductOrder", conditionToGetProductOrder) .then(res => { console.log(res.data); setInfoProductOrder(res.data); }) } const renderInfoProductOrders = infoProductOrders.map(item => { return ( {item.TENSP}
{item.TENMAU}, {item.MASIZE} {item.GIABAN} {item.SOLUONG} {item.TONGGIA} ) }) useEffect(()=> { handleGetInfoProductOrder(); },[]); return (
